ContentRating

public enum ContentRating: String, Codable

A type indicating the content rating of a resource

  • clean

    The resource is rated as not containing explicit content

    Declaration

    Swift

    case clean
  • explicit

    The resource is rated as containing explicit content

    Declaration

    Swift

    case explicit
